page.title: 04Poultry-rearing,Easons Green
page.content: Related to Palehouse Common Farm are poultry houses. Chickens are supplied from a Suffolk firm and are reared for commercial sale. The farm has a capacity for 39,000 chickens and is totally mechanised. One man rents and looks after the farm himself. The feed is chemically balanced for optimum results and is supplied locally. The sheds are heated initially using butane gas until the chickens' own body heat generates a constant temperature. The man is local and leads a quiet family life.
